A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw this on the 14th and was not disappointed! It offers new and interesting ideas as well as major shocks and twists that I for one did not see coming. Action from beginning to end\, and the battle sequences that are enough to thrill anyone old or new to the series\, I guarantee you'll enjoy it albiet with very minor flaws here and there but not enough to keep me from watching it a second time! You'll love it!...unless you're an overly obsessed fanboy who still lives in 1977 and hates Disney and \"diversity\" in their Star Wars films.
